ComicInfo.Summary:
With the nations of the Earth still in chaos, The Coven—the secret society of Russian vampires—are eager to fill the power vacuum following the fall of the evil Shadow Lord, Gargos. Their leader, the Vampire Tsar, has a hunger for the mega-corporation Ultratech – but the corporation’s CEO—the artificial intelligence, ARIA—is not in the mood for a hostile takeover.
Meanwhile the warrior Jago has renounced violence—but how long that will last when the Vampire Tsar’s Wendigo assassins catch up with him?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Yildiray Cinar & Peter Pantazis | 1 | B | Cover B | Jonathan Lau & José Villarrubia | 2 | C | Subscription Cover C | Cam Adams & Vinicius Andrade | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Jonathan Lau | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Yildiray Cinar | 5 |

ComicInfo.Characters: ARIA, Black Eagle, Cinder, Glacius, Jago, Mira Fallegeros, True Tsar
